column1: Río Tercero is a city located on the Tercero River in the Tercero Arriba Department of Córdoba Province (Argentina).

column2: college basketball player with the Temple Owls
father of Juan Fernandez and former professional basketball player
tennis player that reached US Open semifinals (1980 and 1982) and Roland Garros semifinals (1980 and 1983)
